pages.title: Red Knee Tarantula
pages.text: Brachypelma smithi is a species of spider in the family Theraphosidae ($(o)tarantulas$()) native to Mexico.$(br2)It has been confused with Brachypelma hamorii; both have been called Mexican redknee tarantulas.$(br2)Mexican redknee tarantulas are a popular choice as pets among tarantula keepers.
